channel.title: Project on YoSQL - write more SQL
channel.description: Recent content in Project on YoSQL - write more SQL

item.title: Alternatives
item.description: Here is an incomplete list of tools that we consider to be close siblings to YoSQL: https://github.com/krisajenkins/yesql https://www.hugsql.org/ https://github.com/OpenGamma/ElSql https://sqlc.dev/ (Go)

item.title: Scope and Vision
item.description: vision: zero runtime dependencies as few surprises as possible should never fail correct code over performance scope: all existing database access APIs java/jvm only all existing build tools out-of-scope: transaction management object mapping SQL parsing/understanding
